author: Kurt Zindulka
title: Sadiq Khan Blames ‘Structural Racism’ For Disproportionate Coronavirus Deaths Amongst Minority Groups
description: London Mayor Sadiq Khan has called on the government to start collecting and publishing the ethnicities of those infected with the Chinese coronavirus, claiming that "structural racism" in Britain has led to more racial minorities dying from the illness.
content:
London Mayor Sadiq Khan has called on the government to start collecting and publishing the ethnicities of those infected with the Chinese coronavirus, claiming that “structural racism” in Britain has led to more racial minorities dying from the illness.
